title: Combien your top two mastery champions into one champion.
body:
What kind of abomination is it?

Mine Is Vi Sion.

Passive makes It unkillable and get a shield whenever they hit an enemy.

Q makes it stand still for a few seconds, and then dash with a field of knock up in front of them during the dash, stopping at the first champion hit directly with its fist.

W Is a shield, with the passive effect to increase max hp on every kill, and every third auto attack doing max health damage, shredding armor, and giving attack speed.

E is and auto reset with two charges, and it causes a cone to emanate from the target hit, every target hit has its armor shredded and is slowed, and every minion or monster is blown back, dealing increased damage.

R is a cross map targeted unstoppable dash that when connected knocks all nearby targets up and places them in front of the monster, and then stuns them long enough for the thing to charge Q
